attributes.action: Keep the Red Arrows in their home county, also what is to become of the airshow.
attributes.background: After news of another RAF Base to be sold there three points to be discussed (1) why is the goverment allowing the history of this great bomber county to be 'disposed' of, (2) We need to keep Linconcolnshire to stay as the Red Arrows home (3) What is to become of Air Show recently moved to Scampton.
